overview: Isabella's stepdad is concerned that she doesn't spend enough time with her girlfriends; Isabella agrees but the reason is because all she wants to do is hang out with him! Angel wanted to get her stepdad a really nice gift but she really messed it up; luckily she had the gift he wanted more than anything, right between her legs! Taylor has broken up with her boyfriend and now the only thing on her mind is revenge sex and her lucky stepbrother gets to help her do the dirty deed! When Tiffany comes home and finds her stepdad baking cookies in hopes of building a closer relationship with her, she's so touched that she decides to do some touching of her own!
title: Dad Crush 12
